deployIrrevocableVesting(address,uint32,.details: The sender needs to approve `amount` API3 tokens to this contract before calling this function

params.amount: Amount of tokens to be vested over the period
Amount of tokens to be vested over the period

devdoc.title: Contract that deploys an IrrevocableVesting implementation and allows it to be cloned to create vestings

deployIrrevocableVesting(address,uint32,.notice: Deploys an IrrevocableVesting clone and transfers the vesting amount to it from the sender

predictIrrevocableVesting(address,uint32.notice: Predicts the address of the IrrevocableVesting clone that would be deployed by this contract
